typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	device_id as string
}
source(output(
		device_id as string,
		customer_id as string,
		timestamp as string,
		stay_time as string,
		age as string,
		gender as string,
		mask as string,
		order as string,
		status as string,
		watch_time as string,
		max_watch_duration as string,
		watch_start_time as string,
		detail_watch_time as (start_time as string, end_time as string)[],
		direction_roll as double,
		direction_pitch as double,
		direction_yaw as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> source1
source1 filter(equals(device_id, $device_id)) ~> fileter1
source1 aggregate(groupBy(stay_time),
	stay_time_sum = count(stay_time)) ~> StayTimeAggregate
fileter1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		customer_id as string,
		target_hour as string,
		stay_time_sum as integer,
		generation as integer,
		gender as integer,
		mask as integer,
		watch_time_sum as integer
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		customer_id
	)) ~> sink1
